Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Angels and the Chicago White Sox meet Wednesday in MLB action from Guaranteed Rate Field.
This will be the second installment in a three-game series.
Jose Suarez is on a good run over his last three appearances with zero earned runs and a save in 12.0 total innings.
Davis Martin has given up eight earned runs over 8.0 innings during a pair of losses in his last two outings.
